snippet: JACOBSEN--Norman, 86, of Franklin Township, NJ, formerly of East Brunswick, on February 14, 2016. Reti- red Senior Vice President NationsBank, New York, NY. Husband of Iris; father of Barry (Diana) and Michele (John) Fiorentino; brother of Eric; grandfather of five. Predeceased by brothers Philip Jacobsen, Victor Jopling and sister Betty Streeter. Service details at www.brunswick memorialhome.com. 1/3
